scripts.build: emcc -v -flto --llvm-lto 1 -lm -O0 astmath/astMath/astMath.cpp asttime/astTime/astTime.cpp SGP4/SGP4/SGP4.cpp coordfk5/coordFK5/coordFK5.cpp sgp4sdp4/sgp4sdp4.c  sgp4sdp4/sgp_in.c sgp4sdp4/sgp_math.c  sgp4sdp4/sgp_obs.c  sgp4sdp4/sgp_time.c  sgp4sdp4/solar.c astro.cpp -o wasmmodule.mjs -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=@exported_functions -s WASM=1 -s SINGLE_FILE=1 -s TOTAL_MEMORY=24MB -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap"]' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1
scripts.build:dev: emcc -v -lm -g4 astmath/astMath/astMath.cpp asttime/astTime/astTime.cpp SGP4/SGP4/SGP4.cpp coordfk5/coordFK5/coordFK5.cpp sgp4sdp4/sgp4sdp4.c  sgp4sdp4/sgp_in.c sgp4sdp4/sgp_math.c  sgp4sdp4/sgp_obs.c  sgp4sdp4/sgp_time.c  sgp4sdp4/solar.c astro.cpp -o wasmmodule.mjs -s ASSERTIONS=2 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=@exported_functions -s WASM=1 -s SINGLE_FILE=1 -s TOTAL_MEMORY=24MB -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap"]' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1
scripts.build:llvm: emcc -v -fPIC -lm -O3 astmath/astMath/astMath.cpp asttime/astTime/astTime.cpp SGP4/SGP4/SGP4.cpp coordfk5/coordFK5/coordFK5.cpp astro.cpp -o external.bc
scripts.build:clang++: clang++ -v -g -lm -fPIC -v -nostartfiles -static -undefined dynamic_lookup astmath/astMath/astMath.cpp asttime/astTime/astTime.cpp SGP4/SGP4/SGP4.cpp coordfk5/coordFK5/coordFK5.cpp sgp4sdp4/sgp4sdp4.c  sgp4sdp4/sgp_in.c sgp4sdp4/sgp_math.c  sgp4sdp4/sgp_obs.c  sgp4sdp4/sgp_time.c  sgp4sdp4/solar.c astro.cpp -o external.a
scripts.build:clang++:wasm: clang++ -O3 -fno-exceptions -Wl,--no-entry,--export=registerEntity,--export=describeObject,--export=sizeOfsatelliteCatalog,--export=propagate,--export=generateEphemeris,--export=getValue,--export=getValueInReferenceFrame,--export=free,--export=freePtr,--export=deletePtr,--export=removeEntity,--export=removeAll,--export=getSatAzElRange,--export=getSatAzElRangeForInterval,--export=getSatAzElRangePositionForInterval --target=wasm32-unknown --sysroot=/opt/wasi-sdk/share/wasi-sysroot -v -g -lm -fPIC -v -nostartfiles astmath/astMath/astMath.cpp asttime/astTime/astTime.cpp SGP4/SGP4/SGP4.cpp coordfk5/coordFK5/coordFK5.cpp sgp4sdp4/sgp4sdp4.c  sgp4sdp4/sgp_in.c sgp4sdp4/sgp_math.c  sgp4sdp4/sgp_obs.c  sgp4sdp4/sgp_time.c  sgp4sdp4/solar.c astro.cpp -o sgp4.wasm
